author: Gale, Dunstan.
publisher: Printed [by John Beale] for Roger Iackson, and are to be sold in his shop neere Fleet Conduit,
notes: "Intended to be issued as pt. 2 of [STC] 12221, but only the Göttingen copy is so bound"--STC.
